description: List of Variables of this dataset

786c0f.name: Unaided Awareness (Coffee Roasters)
786c0f.description: When you think of independent coffee roasters, which names come to mind?

0894c5.name: Weight
0894c5.description: Are you the parent or guardian of any children under the age of 18?

2d27ab.name: Aided Awareness (Coffee Roasters)
2d27ab.description: Which of these independent coffee roasters have you heard of? Check all that apply.

7a89e0.name: Aided Awareness (Taxis)
7a89e0.description: Which of the following on-demand taxi and car services have you heard of? Check all that apply.

f2a681.name: Specific Service Usage
f2a681.description: Which of the following on-demand taxi and car services have you used in the past two months? [Asked if used any service]

8f7db6.name: Ritual Roasters Usage
8f7db6.description: Which of the following have you purchased in the last month? [Asked if aware of coffee roaster]

5b6a73.name: Children Under 18
5b6a73.description: Are you the parent or guardian of any children under the age of 18?

ede6a8.name: Consideration
ede6a8.description: If you were to use an on-demand taxi and car service, which of these would you consider?

91a33f.name: Family Income
91a33f.description: Thinking back over the last year, what was your family's annual income?

3a5f89.name: FOURBARREL Usage
3a5f89.description: Which of the following have you purchased in the last month? [Asked if aware of coffee roaster]

62c00f.name: Likely Purchase
62c00f.description: Which of these would you be most likely to use?

ee3e40.name: Stumptown Coffee Roasters Usage
ee3e40.description: Which of the following have you purchased in the last month? [Asked if aware of coffee roaster]

11b0b9.name: Unaided Awareness (Taxis)
11b0b9.description: Which of the following taxi services have you heard of?

0f6ce0.name: Usage
0f6ce0.description: Have you used a Taxi Service in the last 2 weeks?

8d7127.name: Blue Bottle Coffee Usage
8d7127.description: Which of the following have you purchased in the last month? [Asked if aware of coffee roaster]
